results.content:
Having purchased the course I now find that no support has been available for over six months.
it is also worth mentioning that the only source code is a basic start file
I have requested a refund, apparently that may take over 30 days

results.content: This course teaches NOTHING about the Codeigniter framework. This is a very misleading title, buyer beware!!! I am also curious how this got great rankings, hmmm. Waste of my money.  I will be submitting a claim via paypal since I paid with paypal.
